remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
csbiedf.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
csbiedf.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x C ) $.
csbiedf.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
csbiedf.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B = C ) $.
csbiedf $p |- ( ph -> [_ A / x ]_ B = C ) $.
$d A x $.
